result.title: Code jam scoreboard data
result.content:
Hi guys I was trying to filter the scoreboard for code jam based on different things, for example by country, but I couldn't find a way to do it, so I ended up creating a report where I could see all of the information in the scoreboard and apply filters, etc. Link is here

I will continue to update it as rounds start progressing.

You can filter by country, nickname or round (if you ctrl+click you can select multiple things)

I tried to put information which I found useful, let me know what you think!

Edit: Moved everything to 1 page and instead allowed to filter based on round + added round 1B and 1C

Edit2: Added round 2
